span.style: font-weight: bolder; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(31, 73, 125);

strong.span: Latest Updates: en Español an Kreyòl

strong.em: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis announced 4/18/2020 that due to COVID-19, all K-12 school campuses in the state will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Distance Learning will continue.

br.hr: • SDPBC Distance Learning Website - Information & Resources

span.br:
Technical question, IT Service Desk, 561-242-4100, M-F, 6:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.
Student Mental Health Helpline, 561-432-6389, M-F, 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.

span.hr: • Call 211 Helpline - Additional Emotional Wellness Resources

div.div: NOTICE: Under Florida law, email addresses are public record. If you do not want your email addresses released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing. To report waste, fraud, corruption, or abuse, please call the Inspector General Hotline: (855) 561-1010.
